name: LD46jAM
description:
RULE:

  • NPCs destory the LEVEL.
  • You beat NPCs, and gain the chance to spawn the tile of the LEVEL.
  • Once all tiles are gone(the LEVEL is dead), game ends.

CONTROL:

Via Keyboard and Mouse

  • WASD or Arrow Keys for Directions.
  • Space to Jump
  • G or Mouse Left to Dash Strike
  • H or Mouse Right to Spawn a tile

Via Xbox Controller

  • A to Jump
  • X to Dash Strike
  • B to Spawn a tile
